column2: Halfling commanders lead with hope in one hand and the promise of food in the other. It is surprisingly effective.
Esteemed figures in Halfling society, Fieldwardens keep the Moot safe from threats inside and outside.
Master Chefs are the greatest cooks in Halfling society, which might as well mean they are its high priests.
Halfling Sheriffs are both local militia leaders and law enforcement... most of their time.
